description: Young stud Shane Rollins is instructed to 'Pick a fight in a bar', so he heads over to the local watering hole and flirts with Ray Stone's saucy girlfriend, enraging the big thug. Their heated confrontation soon leads to a hot fuck-and-suck session between them, with Tamas Eszterhazy quickly joining in the fray, where they all make love and war.
title: Brawlers, Scene #02
